latex:
For each positive integer $n$, let\\
\[a_n = \frac {(n + 9)!}{(n - 1)!}.\]\\
Let $k$ denote the smallest positive integer for which the rightmost nonzero digit of $a_k$ is odd.  The rightmost nonzero digit of $a_k$ is\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\ 1\qquad
\textbf{(B)}\ 3\qquad
\textbf{(C)}\ 5\qquad
\textbf{(D)}\ 7\qquad
\textbf{(E)}\ 9$
